title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal tax benefits relating to company-owned life insurance.
content: Taxpayer Savings and Employee Notification Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to include in gross income from nonqualified company-owned life insurance contracts income and death benefits . States that violations of such provisions shall be treated as a violation of an unfair or deceptive act or practice under the Federal Trade Commission Act.
